dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Da Costa, L. 2007. Brycinus humilis. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Present in Kwanza, Kunene, Okavango river systems. In Angola, the species occurs in the Kwanza River and Kunene River (Caculovar River) systems.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Quanza, Cubango, Cunene, Okavango; Congo basin reports need confirmation (Ref. 42019).

Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Unit)

Justification
This species is known from three catchments: Kwanza, Kunene, Okavango River. No obvious threats are known.
